___name.description: Name of the input/output property to change

___replaceWith.description: Replace original selector with new one

___conditions.description: An array of function names that will be executed as conditions.

___selector.description: Original selector to apply change to

___type.description: Type of selector the change applies to - either component or directive

___owner.description: Component that emits the output or accepts the input

___moveBetweenElementTags.description: Move property value between owner's element tags.
